channel.title: NPC Clipping
channel.description:
Hey Mopar, how can I clip NPCs. When I attack them, they walk through the wall. If anyone has any tips or could point me towards a tutorial, I'd greatly appreciate it.
P.S. Please don't be an ass and say "o use da serchbar u nub" I have tried searching the forums for a tutorial. I'm stuck.

item.title: NPC Clipping
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

have a map of tiles where objects that occupy tiles have a flag to them. traverse the map with BFS, done.

Read full topic
